content: formed in 2013 after vocalist Leo Ashline emerged from the fog of a thirteen year battle with addiction and began to collaborate with friend and multi-instrumentalist Shaun Ringsmuth. The duo embraced the ethos and aggression of punk rock, and the experimental attitude and disillusionment of early industrial music to create a sound unique to them alone. Street Sects has earned a reputation for their confrontational, sensory deprived fog-drenched live performances. Their 3rd LP will be released in the Summer of 2025.

Street Sects will be releasing a new album this coming July 2025 through Compound Records (a new imprint started by HEALTH); the band have previously completed multiple successful European tours including an appearance at the legendary Roadburn Festival. During 2024, Lanal Del Rabies completed a mammoth 4 week tour alongside Pharmakon and Kollaps, a tour which saw multiple sold out shows and festival appearances at Soulcrusher Festival (NL) and Improved Sequence Festival II (IT); Lana Del Rabies also performed a very well received show at Roadburn 2024.

conceived by Phoenix, Arizona -based artist Sam An, is a captivating force in underground dark electronic and fringe heavy music. Merging industrial, gothic noise, and metal with experimental elements, LanaDel Rabies explores the esoteric brutality of what it means to be human in a world consumed by the threat of apocalypse. She is known for her intense and immersing live performances that hold the audience in captive catharsis.

Her first two albums, ‚ÄûIn The End I Am A Beast‚Äú and ‚ÄûShadow World,‚Äú released by Los Angeles label Deathbomb Arc, showcase Lana Del Rabies‚Äò futuristic goth sound, addressing American society‚Äôs growing PTSD with a stark, spectral voice.

Her third album, ‚ÄûSTREGA BEATA,‚Äú on Gilgongo Records, has earned acclaim from The Quietus, Metal Hammer, DJ Mag, and more. Described as constructively destructive, Lana Del Rabies‚Äò music outcries from beyond,, with surprising melodic and melancholic moments emerging from the noise and anguish.
Praised by critics for her unique blend of quietly macabre and wildly maximalist music, Lana Del Rabies‚Äò sonic journey, is a potent, beautiful, and darkly transcendent experience.

Known for her visceral performances and engaging multimedia live shows, she has toured North America and the EU over the past 7 years as a headliner and with acts including 3 Teeth and Author and Punisher.

She has performed at a variety of international festivals, including Coldwaves (Chicago and New York), Blow Up Festival (Finland), New Forms Festival (Canada), and HOCO Fest (US). She will be performing at Roadburn 2024.
Lana Del Rabies has been featured in WIRE Magazine, FLOOD Magazine, The Times, Metal Hammer, NTS, Forbes, Bandcamp, and more.

√úber die Newcomer-Band LEUCHTSTOFF ist bisher wenig bekannt. Doch eines ist sicher: Mit ihrer Demo-Single ‚ÄûEinfach Sein‚Äú haben sie den Nerv der New-Wave-Szene getroffen und sich mit nur einem Song bereits einen Namen gemacht.

Das Demo wurde √ºber DistroKid ver√∂ffentlicht und kommt auf Spotify bereits auf schlappe 4 Millionen Streams! Beachtlich, denkt man daran, dass √ºber Leuchtstoff wenig bis nichts bekannt ist und die Hit-Single die einzige Ver√∂ffentlichung der Band darstellt. Die Youtube-Kommentare unter ‚ÄûEinfach Sein‚Äú fordern alle das gleiche: neue Musik!

Es wurde still um die Newcomer-Band. Im Januar ver√∂ffentlichten sie ohne Vorwarnung ihr Deb√ºt-Album ‚Äûfl√ºchitg‚Äú. Im November geht LEUCHTSTOFF gemeinsam mit seiner Band auf erste Headline Tour, um das langersehnte Deb√ºt-Album live zu pr√§sentieren ud bringt neue Songs auf die B√ºhnen Deutschlands und √ñsterreichs.
‚ÄûFl√ºchtig‚Äú ist ein Album voller Kontraste. Es f√§ngt das Sch√∂ne im Verg√§nglichen ein und kreiert eine Soundwelt. die gepr√§gt von den k√ºnstlerischen Einfl√ºssen des Berliner Musikers ist.
Die ‚ÄûTour 2025‚Äú startet am 02. November in M√ºnchen und f√ºhrt die 5-k√∂pfige Band durch insgesamt acht St√§dte mit Tourfinale in ihrer Heimatstadt Berlin.

content: Das Cabinet des Dr. Caligari / Merd Saplo
Wir werden wieder einen Stummfilm instrumental begleiten! Das Cabinet der Dr. Caligari steht diesmal am Plan! Schaut vorbei!
Eintritt ist zwischen 5 bis 10‚Ç¨ frei w√§hlbar.

With a unique blend of melodic psych-pop and experimental ambient elements, Tape Moon creates a nostalgic atmosphere. The focus lies on the harmonious interplay between catchy melodies and sonic experimentation within the context of pop music.
The new album ‚ÄûDetached‚Äú is out on October 17th ‚Äì digital & for the connoisseurs among you on beautiful limited-edition picture cassette.

Philomena is a young singer and songwriter from Austria. With her sensitive lyrics and catchy melodies, she moves within a tension between strength and softness, telling stories about the joys and struggles of her young adulthood, while reflecting in poetic clarity on what it means to let go and find oneself. Through her music, she aims to create a space for the sensitive and soft among us.

Parisian post punk band M√©nades are off to a flying start with their debut album! After two European tours and an appearance at Rock en Seine, the band embarked on a West Coast tour of the United States, playing FreakOut! festival in Seattle and Psyched Fest in San Francisco.

M√©nades is a band that resurrects the rebellious fever of 90s punk rock with hybrids of shoegaze, psyche and even funky elements that create syncopated rhythms, reverberated vocals, dissonant guitars and bouncy bass lines.

The band‚Äôs penchant for moving around and playing live can be heard in the background on this first opus, which is shot through with riotous energy. It‚Äôs precisely this fury bordering on delirium that we find in the post-punk band‚Äôs music, and which they transform into a veritable explosion on stage. Their possessed bodies and instruments, combined with a turbulent, mocking euphoria, bring them close to the spirit of the Viagra Boys, Idles and Amyl & the Sniffers.

MATCHING OUTFITS are a trio of adopted Berliners whose warped, wistful take on indie pop has been compared to ‚Äúa Super 8 film from the family attic‚Äù. Singer Linnea M√•rtensson‚Äôs lyrics capture life‚Äôs major losses and minor inconveniences in gut-wrenching, occasionally hilarious detail, while dulcet harmonies morph into discordant freakouts and shout-along choruses. Their debut cassette ‚ÄòBand Made Out Of Sand‚Äô caught the attention of cult radio station WFMU as well as New Jersey label Bar/None (Yo La Tengo, The Feelies, They Might Be Giants), which signed the band and are releasing their sophomore album ‚ÄòDitch Me‚Äô on July 25th 2025. The band does not wear matching outfits, except when they do.

Zwischen den verzerrten Frequenzen von Digital-Post-Punk und dem unb√§ndigen Tempo von Nu-Techno erhebt sich ein Sound, der nach Ver√§nderung schreit. TEER brechen und verbinden. Ihre harten technoiden Beats treffen auf wummernde Drums, treibende Synthesizer und atmosph√§rische Verzerrungen. Die Vocals tauchen als gefl√ºsterte Fragmente oder verzerrte Schreie aus der Dunkelheit auf, mal schneidend, mal wie ein ferner, kaum greifbarer Hall. Zusammen formen sie ein Klangbild, das bedr√§ngt und gleichzeitig mitrei√üt.

TEER blicken auf die Abgr√ºnde unserer Zeit. Ihre Songs sprechen von Apokalypse und Weltschmerz, von der Last, Mensch zu sein, und von der Fragilit√§t der Erde, die wir bewohnen. Konsum und Macht, Abh√§ngigkeit und Rausch ‚Äì sie tanzen hier auf einem schmalen Grat zwischen Sehnsucht und Zerst√∂rung. In den Schatten ihrer Texte lauern verdr√§ngte W√ºnsche und verbotene Begierden, die aufbrechen und sich wie Glut unter der Oberfl√§che brennen.
